07317ab9fddc66855470ba840c4b68a340b188ea.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_managedhost
        (
            state_modified_at,
            state,
            immutable_state,
            not_deleted,
            address,
            fqdn,
            nodename,
            boot_time,
            needs_update,
            corosync_ring0,
            install_method,
            content_type_id,
            server_profile_id)
        VALUES
        ('2020-07-02 15:50:34.356076-04', 'unconfigured', 'f', 't', 'foo', 'foo.bar', '', Null, 'f', '', '', Null, 'foo')
        ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

7c2641e656178536cc5c92aba41d7fd20ae6bc35.query: select id from chroma_core_managedhost where fqdn = $1 and not_deleted = 't'

b8e774ab32b79eb3f2d87b7f373b609831f72f63.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_serverprofile
        (name, ui_name, ui_description, managed, worker, user_selectable, initial_state, ntp, corosync, corosync2, pacemaker, "default")
        VALUES
        ('foo', 'foo', 'foo', 'f', 'f', 't', 'bar', 'f', 'f', 'f', 'f', 't')
        ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

bb7fb337cfeac9a17eefb21a498e76be70c2f395.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_device
        (fqdn, devices)
        VALUES ($1, $2)
        ON CONFLICT (fqdn) DO UPDATE
        SET devices = EXCLUDED.devices

beba469f5047ef7449f5e4fc77e04ded6264098d.query:
UPDATE chroma_core_lustreclientmount
            SET 
                mountpoints = array[]::text[],
                state = 'unmounted',
                state_modified_at = now()
            WHERE host_id = $1
            AND id != ALL($2)

d21d5385bab3f2131870f7eb192ae2e6a6e44ea4.query: select id from django_content_type where model = 'lustreclientmount'

d7d2f630597f24da27fd997508e60805e8e626e7.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_lustreclientmount
        (host_id, filesystem, mountpoints, state, state_modified_at, immutable_state, not_deleted, content_type_id)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, 'mounted', now(), 'f', 't', $4)
        ON CONFLICT (host_id, filesystem, not_deleted) DO UPDATE
        SET 
            mountpoints = excluded.mountpoints,
            state = excluded.state,
            state_modified_at = excluded.state_modified_at
        RETURNING id
